        public boolean doesntExist(Vertex vertex,
                           Directions dir)
        Method that tells if the designated vertex is already created or not
        Parameters:
        vertex - the vertex from which we look if another exists
        dir - the direction in which the supposed vertex would be
        Returns:
        true if there is no vertex yet, false otherwise

        Returns:

        Returns:
        the generated vertex .
